description: When set to true, the plan goes directly to the Create Position business process. When set to false, the plan goes through the Enrichment step enabling you to review and add or update required data.
A flag when set to true creates a new Org Design.

Specify a number greater than 0 for Positions Allocated. (Plan Split ID - [Plan Split ID])
Specify 1 as the number of positions. To create multiple positions using this plan line, specify a plan period start date. (Plan Split ID - [Plan Split ID])

You can't import a row that has a Workforce Planning Action Event business process already in progress or successfully completed. Remove the row that uses this Plan Split ID or this combination of Plan Split ID and Plan Period Start Date: [Plan Split ID Plan Period Start Date].
